参与方式：<br>
打开交通银行APP，首页搜：数字人民币，进入数字人民币页面，中间横幅处，点击 交好运(币)有礼 ，<img id="aimg_ZeSx0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/d12RCKFD/202502201007182.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/d12RCKFD/202502201007182.jpg">抽取你的幸运盲盒<img id="aimg_L890F" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/pVBYXxk6/202502201007181.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/pVBYXxk6/202502201007181.jpg"><img id="aimg_Yo4iE" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/63Xnt1ZK/20250220100718.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/63Xnt1ZK/20250220100718.jpg"><img id="aimg_dfLZ3" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/90x7PmnX/20250220100659.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/90x7PmnX/20250220100659.jpg"></td></tr></tbody></table>
